meta.author: Yusuke Yokota
meta.description: Centralized curriculum data for MATH-CS COMPASS - single source of truth for section pages and compass map

I.title: Linear Algebra to Algebraic Foundations
I.description: Explore the foundations of Linear Algebra, covering key concepts such as linear equations, vector spaces, eigenvalues, orthogonality, least squares, and stochastic matrices.
I.tagline: The Mathematics of Structure and Space

parts.title: Classification of Finite Abelian Groups
keywords: Fundamental Theorem of Finite Abelian Groups

parts.title: The Architecture of Rings and Fields

II.title: Calculus to Optimization & Analysis
II.description: Explore key calculus concepts essential for optimization, analysis, and machine learning. Topics include derivatives, Jacobians, gradient descent, Newton's method, constrained optimization, measure theory, and Lebesgue integration.
II.tagline: The Mathematics of Change and Convergence

parts.title: The Derivative of Scalar Functions of Matrices

III.title: Probability & Statistics
III.description: Explore fundamental concepts of probability and statistics essential for machine learning, including probability theory, random variables, distributions, Bayesian inference, entropy, and the Fisher Information Matrix.
III.tagline: The Mathematics of Uncertainty and Inference

parts.title: Intro to Bayesian Statistics
keywords: Normal Distribution Model with known Variance œÉ¬≤
Normal Distribution Model with known Mean Œº

parts.title: Markov Chains
keywords: Maximum likelihood estimation(MLE) in Markov models

IV.title: Discrete Mathematics & Algorithms
IV.description: Explore the foundations of discrete mathematics and algorithms, covering graph theory, combinatorics, and the theory of computation. Learn key concepts essential for mathematical reasoning and algorithmic problem-solving.
IV.tagline: The Mathematics of Logic and Finite Structures

parts.title: Intro to Combinatorics
keywords: Sum of powers of positive integers

V.title: Machine Learning
V.description: Explore machine learning ideas and applications.
V.tagline: The Mathematics of Synthesis and Intelligence
